AT86RF212 Programming » Software Programming Model

Introduction

This section describes the hardware interface (SPI, GPIO, IRQ), the basic interface functions (read/write, interrupt) and the main states of the radio transceiver. Details about the radio transceiver parameters are given in the AT86RF212 datasheet. This section also introduces MSCs, which are used for the representation of the use cases.
